title: shAradE vINA vAdana
sahitya:
shAradE vINA vAdana.  rAgA: dEvagAndhAri.  tALA: Adi  shAradE vINA vAdana vishAradE vandE tavapadE


anupallavi

  nArada jananI catur vadana nAyaki bhukti mukti dAyaki
naLina daLa lOcani bhava mOcani hamsavAhini hamsagAmini


caraNam    indrAdi sakala bhrndAraka gaNa vandita padAra vindE
indu viTambana manda smitayuta sundara mukhAra vindE
vandAru sujana mandAra dayA sadanE mrdu gatanE
vANi nitya kalyANi varadE rAmadAsa hrdayAlayE shrI                    (saaradhE)
